tutorials.title: Tutorial: 3D Classification (BETA)
tutorials.description: 3D Classification (BETA) provides a way to distinguish discrete heterogeneous states, or classes, from single particle cryo-EM data.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: Blob Picker Tuner
tutorials.description: The Blob Picker Tuner finds optimal blob sizes, shapes, and thresholds for particle picking by comparing picks to a small number of manually selected examples.

tutorials.title: Tutorial: EMDB-friendly XML file for FSC plots
tutorials.description: In cryoSPARC v3.3+, an EMDB-friendly XML version of every plotted FSC is available to download.

tutorials.title: EER File Support
tutorials.description: CryoSPARC now supports reading input movies in electron-event representation (EER) format.

tutorials.title: Priority Job Queuing
tutorials.description: All jobs in cryoSPARC now have a priority property that the cryoSPARC scheduler uses to sort jobs to be executed.
